name: Asteroids (itch) (LeonIdle)
description:
Asteroids is a game about destroing asteroids with your spaceship and gaining score. This is game made in a week by 16 years old and this is my first finished game. Please share your highscore in the comments.

Controls:

Space - Shoot

Arrows - Move

Escape - Pause

Credits:

Twitter:@LeonidVDK

Font: Pixeled by OmegaPC777

Font's website: https://www.dafont.com
